content.question: Which of the following best explains an effect of the events described in the excerpt?

choices.label: African Americans increasingly moved away from urban areas.
New forms of expression emerged in African American art and culture.
Support by African Americans for New Deal policies declined.
African American socioeconomic standing improved overall.

content.answer: African American socioeconomic standing improved overall.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
